In trial participants 65 years age older , commonly reported (≥10%) adverse reactions pain injection site (88.3%), fatigue (64.8%), headache (53.3%), myalgia (51.8%), arthralgia (40.2%), chills (32.7%), nausea/vomiting (15.0%), swelling injection site (13.0%), axillary swelling/tenderness (12.7%). Side effects reported post-authorization use vaccine include: Severe allergic reactions Myocarditis (inflammation heart muscle) Pericarditis (inflammation lining outside heart) Fainting association injection vaccine These may possible side effects Spikevax. Serious side effects zopiclone include: Allergic reactions. The signs allergic reaction may include: rash swallowing breathing problems swelling lips, face, throat tongue Stop taking medication see doctor go emergency room straight away develop symptoms allergic reaction. Tell doctor soon possible following side effects, rare unknown frequency: Poor memory (amnesia) since starting medication. This problem less likely occur 7-8 hours uninterrupted sleep taking medication. Seeing hearing things real (hallucinations) Falling, especially elderly Thinking things true (delusions) Feeling low sad (depressed mood) Tell doctor pharmacist following side effects get serious lasts longer days: Including following common side effects zopicolne: A mild bitter metallic taste mouth dry mouth Feeling drowsy sleepy Dry mouth Including following uncommon side effects zopiclone: Feeling sick (nausea) sick (vomiting) Feeling dizzy sleepy Headache Nightmares Feeling physically mentally tired Agitation Including following rare side effects zopiclone: Feeling confused Itchy, lumpy rash (urticaria) Feeling irritable aggressive Reduced sex drive Difficulty breathing short breath Including following side effects unknown frequency zopiclone: Feeling restless angry Feeling light headed problems coordination Double vision Moving unsteadily staggering Muscular weakness Indigestion Becoming dependent medication Slower breathing (respiratory depression) Unusual skin sensations numbness, tingling, pricking, burning creeping skin (paraesthesia) Mental problems poor memory Difficulty paying attention Disrupted normal speech Zopiclone may cause sleepwalking unusual behavior (such driving, eating, making phone call, sex etc.) fully awake. These possible side effects zopiclone. Call doctor medical advice side effects. You may report side effects FDA 1-800-FDA-1088. Interactions Tell healthcare provider medicines take, including prescription over-the-counter medicines, vitamins, herbal supplements. Especially tell doctor taking medicines listed below. Zopiclone may increase effect following medicines: Medicines mental problems (antipsychotics) Medicines depression Medicines epilepsy (anticonvulsants) Medicines used surgery (anaesthetics) Medicines calm reduce anxiety sleep problems (hypnotics) Medicines hay fever, rashes allergies make sleepy (sedative antihistamines) chlorphenamine promethazine Some medicines moderate severe pain (narcotic analgesics) codeine, methadone, morphine, oxycodone, pethidine tramadol The following medicines increase chances getting side effects taken zopiclone. To make less likely, doctor may decide lower dose zopiclone: Some antibiotics clarithromycin erythromycin Some medicines fungal infections ketaconazole itraconazole Ritonavir (a protease inhibitor) - HIV infections Concomitant use zopiclone opioids increases risk drowsiness, difficulties breathing, coma death. Follow doctor’s dosage recommendations closely. The following medicines make zopiclone less effective: Some medicines epilepsy carbamazepine, phenobarbital phenytoin Rifampicin (an antibiotic) - infections St John’s Wort (a herbal medicine) - mood swings depression This medication change levels liver enzymes shown blood tests. This mean liver working properly. If going blood test, important tell doctor taking zopiclone. Pregnancy breastfeeding Zopiclone recommended pregnancy. If pregnant, think may pregnant planning baby, ask doctor advice taking medicine. Taking zopiclone pregnancy may affect baby. Some studies shown may increased risk cleft lip palate (sometimes called “harelip”) newborn baby. Reduced fetal movement fetal heart rate variability may occur taking zopiclone second third trimester pregnancy. If zopiclone taken end pregnancy labour, baby may show muscle weakness, drop body temperature, difficulty feeding breathing problems (respiratory depression). If medicine taken regularly late pregnancy, baby may develop physical dependence may risk developing withdrawal symptoms agitation shaking. In case newborn closely monitored postnatal period. Do take zopiclone breastfeeding plan breastfeed. Small amounts medication may pass breast milk. If breastfeeding plan breastfeed, talk doctor pharmacist taking medicine. The opadry white OY-S-38906 coating contains hypromellose, titanium dioxide, macrogol 6000. Zimovane 7.5 mg Zimovane LS 3.75 mg tablets: lactose monohydrate, calcium hydrogen phosphate dihydrate, wheat starch, sodium starch glycollate, magnesium stearate, hypromellose, titanium dioxide macrogol 6000. Inactive ingredients may vary depending brand generic version zopiclone take. Check product label version take full list ingredients. Zimovane marketed Sanofi UK.
